data.message:
Do u guys ever get this message on Facebook saying u won certain amount of money  and u have to give ur information out to them before u even claim ur winnings that I won $1,0000 I think this a scam this is what I got in my message 

In order to claim your winning prize you are to Reconfirm some Data-Bases in which the Facebook Board will make use to get your Winning Certificate and all Necessary document available for you before they can release your winning Funds to you .

Full Name:
Full Home address:
Country:
Mobile Number:
Email Address:
Occupation:

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Joana. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -Abby
That's Scam i'm a victim on that, don't believe .
What happen to u Donato Besid.
